article_title: Death of Paul Schmidt reveals gaps in mental health system
article_text: Paul Schmidt was born at a time when Milwaukee County's mental health system was undergoing massive changes and policymakers touted reforms that would help people live on their own in the community. But when Schmidt needed the system to help him, it failed him instead.

article_metadata.title: Photos: Chronic Crisis: Death of Paul Schmidt reveals gaps in mental health system
